white: Being stuck in a nursery with hyper kids for 5 hours.
Ice skating on a lake of frozen acid.
Determining what season it is by the length of Riker's beard.
Being unwillingly subjected to Sherlock Holmes holodeck adventures.
A bitter man who never experienced the embrace of a loved one.
Singing "Let it Go" as loud as you can.
Using a bag of broken glass as a weapon.
Wesley Crusher's wide array of turtleneck jumpers.
An away team consisting of the Captain, First Officer, and twenty Redshirts.
Calling your friends mom when they annoy you.
Captain Picard screaming 'NO' and breaking a glass display filled with gold spaceship replicas.
Popping a kids balloon to see their face.
Carrying a full fish tank up stairs.
Isolinear chips in the wrong ports.
Trying to sell your siblings on ebay.
Mormon Judy and cow people. (via Bad Lip Reading).
Being as bored as Ben Kenobi on Tattooine.
Setting your phaser gun to kill when it's meant to be on stun.
An away team consisting of the Captain, First Officer, and twenty Redshirts.
Using empath powers to predict when people are bluffing.
Having an alien invade your brain.
Eating a whole watermelon without cutting it.
Getting buried in a pile of Tribbles.
The ability to stop time, but only when I'm sleeping.
The Traveler's sorry excuse for clothing.
Trying to teach Data humor and failing.
The burning cloud of a nebula.
A routine cardiac replacement surgery gone horribly wrong.
Not gaining weight no matter what you eat.
Waking people up with an suprise electro shock therapy.
Getting buried in a pile of Tribbles.
Setting up the ship's auto-destruct to  freak out the crew.
When Deanna Troi wore short skirted uniforms.
Putting the medical tricorder where it does not belong.
Ghina getting everyone drunk just for fun.
The Enterprise being destroyed in yet another movie.
The smell of a wet Wookiee.
The Ninja standing right behind you.
Accidentally giving a town radiation poisoning.
Being stuck in a shuttle ship with Wesley Crusher for 13 hours.
Finding dirty underwear under your bed that isn't yours.
Being put on trial for humanity's crimes.
Finding a dead mouse in my clothing.
A hologram that can do your job better than you.
Emotional trauma caused by a perfectly written holodeck adventure.
Blowing yourself up to save humanity from a poorly written character.
Calling your friends mom when they annoy you.
Data getting stuck in a Chinese finger trap.
The ability to harness sleep and save it for later.
Kissing a shapeshifter who likes to take the form of huge furry monsters.
High schoolers played by adults in their thirties.
Being trapped in a time loop.
Spandex uniforms to improve blood circulation.
Getting stuck in the gravitational pull of a highly explosive planet.
Making Jar Jar Binks an insprational speaker.
The fear of Ducks watching you.
A sexist colony of beefy black space men.
Worf's giant pimple in the movie 'Insurrection'.
